replies.body: Aw, RIP /ALL Chat.

Awww.  I'm going to miss seeing your faces every Monday and Friday and making me laugh with the funny things that you do.  I have watched it since it came out and I'm sad because it's ending :(

Awwww, thanks for all of the great times you've given the community /ALL Chat! We'll miss you greatly!

Rip /all chat :( thresh is ranged through. You can buy runaans on him, and you can't buy the titanic items.
THANK YOU! THIS ANSWERS THE QUESTION!
TEAM YOU CANT ALL DISCONNECT NOTLIKETHIS

It's hard work to put out high quality videos two times per week though, so I understand if you're dropping it due to workload reasons, or if you're just not feeling it anymore. That doesn't make it any less sad however; I love /ALL Chat. :(

Anyways, I enjoyed the video and the montage.
When he said "we are retiring" I got sad!   <3
You're welcome AllChat
Hugs all 'round,  'cause man am I gonna miss /ALL chat {{champion:103}} {{item:3070}}
